com.rshepard.tictactoe

Class TicTacToeBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rshepard.tictactoe.TicTacToeBoard

  • public class TicTacToeBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    TicTacToeBoard creates an 2d array that simulates a Tic Tac Toe board
    Author:
    Richard Shepard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToeBoard()
      Constructor initializes a 3X3 array of type Mark for a game of Tic Tac Toe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mark[][] getBoard()
      Get board returns a mark array consisting of the current state of the game
      boolean setMark(int row, int col, Mark mark)
      Sets a mark on the board array.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToeBoard

        public TicTacToeBoard()
        Constructor initializes a 3X3 array of type Mark for a game of Tic Tac Toe. All spaces are set to the default of empty.

    • Method Detail

      • setMark

        public boolean setMark(int row,
                       int col,
                       Mark mark)
        Sets a mark on the board array.
        Parameters:
        row - The row number of the mark to be placed.
        col - The column number of the mark to be placed.
        mark - The type of mark to be placed(X or O)
        Returns:
        Returns the value of true if the mark was placed False if the spot is not empty.

      • getBoard

        public Mark[][] getBoard()
        Get board returns a mark array consisting of the current state of the game
        Returns:
        Returns a 3X3 array of type Mark (The state of the board)
